bibl.title: A Preliminary Survey of Letters in the Judaean Desert Documents.
When West Met East. The Encounter of Greece and Rome with the Jews, Egyptians, and Others. Studies Presented to Ranon Katzoff in Honor of his 75th Birthday

bibl.note: The Judaean Desert letters [Nr. 1-42: 17 Hebrew, 14 Aramaic, 7 Greek and 4 Latin]. - Preliminary analysis. - A summary of parameters.
